description: Try our easy to follow Sun-blushed Tomato Pesto Crostini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Sunblushed Tomato Pesto Crostini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Purée 140g drained sunblushed tomatoes with 1 garlic clove, 50g toasted pine nuts, 2 tbsp olive oil, 45g grated Parmesan, 1 seeded red chilli, and 1 tbsp lemon juice in a blender or food processor. Check the seasoning and add more lemon juice if necessary. Carefully mound 1 tsp of pesto onto each crostini and garnish with a basil leaf. For a variation, garnish with very thin slices of basil and replace the sun-blushed tomatoes with sun-dried.
